item.title: Should Social Media Be Banned for Children? (English Vocabulary Lesson)
item.description: Australia is banning children from all social media platforms. Under a newly passed law, no one under the age of 16 will be allowed to use Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, or any similar platform. Today, I want to take a deeper look at the reasons behind banning social media, as well as some criticisms and challenges. We’ll end by thinking about the question, “Should Social Media Be Banned for Children?” Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/ARML8307714981

item.title: How Leaders Help Their Teams Discover Their Calling w/ ZOE Music
item.description: Great worship leaders don’t just manage tasks and build great bands—they inspire purpose and help their teams discover their true calling. In this episode, ZOE MUSIC shares how focusing on people over roles creates a transformative... Feed: https://worshiponline.libsyn.com/rss
